extendedInfo.description: The #1 catching Billy the Kid app is now available for FREE!Billy the Kid is loose in New Mexico, and it's up to you to uncover the elusive bandit and his treasures. Gather a posse and track Billy in real life by traveling across the state unlocking clues to The Kid's whereabouts. Pick up bonus loot along the way that can be redeemed for even more prizes in the Catch the Kid General Store!Unofficially the official tracker of historical banditry in the greater Southwest!!

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Loot & clues showed up on my Droid 2 Global!, am not able to \"visit the virtual store\" but checked it out online & got the Taos Wine & Music Vacation!!!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I cant register becuase the form is too much to the left. you cant see what your typing. -mytouch 4g
